**GLOBAL SAMSUNG SEMICONDUCTOR SPECIAL PROGRAM at Seoul National University-ECE Department**

Information about our program below:

\+ Objective: The objective of the program is to train students in the field of semiconductors during their post-graduate courses.

\+ Canditate selection: Samsung DS and SNU select students together, and the process is a combination of the recruitment processes of Samsung and the entrance processes of SNU.

\+ Scholarship and Obligation: Samsung DS provides a full scholarship (tuition, fees, and stipends) to students, and students have an obligation to work at Samsung DS in Korea after their graduation.

\+ Program requirement: The requirements for completing this program include taking courses and writing a thesis related to semiconductors, and obtaining a TOPIK 3 grade before graduation. (Samsung DS and SNU will also offer Korean language education classes.)

\+ Application Procedure:

– Please download the application form : \[[**Download**](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/GSSS-Global-Samsung-Semiconductor-Special-GSSS-Program-at-SNU-ECE.pdf)\
\]

– Complete the form and apply for the GSSS program via email (gsss@capp.snu.ac.kr)

– Due date: January 15th, 2024.

– On-site interview: early February, 2024

\+ additional information: (web-site) gsss.snu.ac.kr, (email) gsss@capp.snu.ac.kr
